BodyName: Subcommittee on Planning, Dispositions and Concessions

Items.Title: Application No. 20155176 HAM, submitted by the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development for approval of an amendment to a previously approved tax exemption pursuant to Section 577 of the Private Housing Finance Law (PHFL) for a property located at 304-306 East 8th Street, Block 390, Lot 9, Borough of Manhattan, Community Board 3, Council District 2.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Application No. C 140411 HAK, submitted by the Department of Housing Preservation and Development, pursuant to Article 16 of the General Municipal Law and Section 197-c of the Charter, for an Urban Development Action Area Project located at 695 Grand Street (Block 2782, Lot 36), and the disposition of such property to a developer to be selected by HPD, Borough of Brooklyn, Community Board 1, Council District 34.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Application No. 20155176 HAM, submitted by the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development for approval of an amendment to a previously approved tax exemption pursuant to Section 577 of the Private Housing Finance Law (PHFL) for a property located at 304-306 East 8th Street, Block 390, Lot 9, Borough of Manhattan, Community Board 3, Council District 2.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Laid Over by Subcommittee

Items.Title: Application No. C 140411 HAK, submitted by the Department of Housing Preservation and Development, pursuant to Article 16 of the General Municipal Law and Section 197-c of the Charter, for an Urban Development Action Area Project located at 695 Grand Street (Block 2782, Lot 36), and the disposition of such property to a developer to be selected by HPD, Borough of Brooklyn, Community Board 1, Council District 34.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Application be Approved by Subcommittee approved by Roll Call.
